name: bugsnag-sourcemaps-example
description: An example of how you can use Bugsnag on a js project with sourcemaps

scripts.build: uglifyjs app.js --compress --mangle --source-map "includeSources=true,url='app.min.js.map'" -o app.min.js && uglifyjs wrongmap.js --compress --mangle --source-map "includeSources=true,url='wrongmap.min.js.map'" -o wrongmap.min.js && uglifyjs randomap.js --compress --mangle --source-map "includeSources=true,url='randomap.min.js.map'" -o randomap.min.js

author: Bugsnag Inc.
